about_the_game:
[Enjoyable and exciting] The second installment of the "Wizard Emona" series with plenty of pixel animations

unc patch

  • All event scenes are pixel animations!

  • The playable character, Wizard Emona, drinks the semen of the baggage handler to recover her magic.

  • If you receive a magic massage at the Sperm World Tree and make Emona climax, she will remember her strong magic.

  • As you gain achievements, the handjob event scenes with the baggage handler and the owner of the tool shop will become more intense.

  • Scenes with the owner of the tool shop can be linked together and automatically played by linking [slow] [fast] [finish].

  • Defeat event scenes for both Emona and companions.

  • When companions' HP reaches 0, you can approach them and watch a sex scene.

  • Only the moans are voiced

Features of the action game!

  • When you use magic on Emona, a ball called an "Attribute Sphere" will be generated, and you can activate strong magic by touching it.

  • Abundant items that allow you to stand on the attribute ball and increase the freedom of action

  • If you use magic on your allies' attacks, you will be given a magic attribute, making the opponent more likely to fall and be defeated.

  • Double jumps are available, which are unique to action games!

  • Even if your allies die, the game will not end.

  • There is a setting that allows you to enter invincible mode.

  • The stage will be cleared when you save all the elf girls captured in various places.

  • You can specify the positioning and jumping method of your allies.

  • The settings make it easier to switch magic.

  • There are 77 special items available.

  • As the story progresses, you can change Detao's skills and capture orcs.

  • On the left side of the screen, there is a special effect called the Time Bonus.

  • In the Time Bonus, there is a boss that only accepts one attribute. Switch magic and fight. If you don't remember the magic you need, go to the Sperm World Tree and try a magic massage.

Events move in all scenes!

In addition, on the memory CG screen (Title → Memory), you can change the animation speed in 10% intervals!

Magic Massage System

When Emona receives a magic massage from the Sperm World Tree, she can remember a new magic.

Use sex toys on her breasts, butt, etc. to make Emona climax.

New sex toys are scattered all over the world.

Help the owner of the tool shop and you'll get a handjob event with the baggage boy!

As you clear the achievements in the action scenes, you can link together and play the erotic events of the owner of the tool shop (Hoon Etti).

You can view the achievements in the report menu.

About attribute spheres and chain magic

When you defeat an enemy with magic in the action scenes, a circle called an "Attribute Sphere" will appear.

When two attribute spheres overlap, a "chain magic" will occur, and a powerful magic will be generated.

When you defeat an enemy with this chain magic, the chances of coins and items dropping will be tripled.

Summary of the previous game (You don't need to play the previous game to play this one)

Emona was fighting goblins to find her missing mother, but when she finds out that her father, Oshirisky, conspired with the goblins to abandon her mother, she heads to the orc forest to chase her fleeing father.

Emona enters an orc habitat, but her servant causes her to shoot herself in the head and she forgets most of her magic. To relive it, she visits a nearby elven town.

It is said that the elven town is home to a "Sperm World Tree" that gathers magical power. However, this sacred tree holds a lewd secret...

Controls

Both keyboard and gamepad are supported.

Press the "F1" key to display the control instructions and key configuration screen.

There are three types of control: "keyboard only", "gamepad only", and "mouse and keyboard".

The loading screen at startup may take more than 10 seconds.

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in the game are over 20 years old.
The game contains explicit adult themes, including nudity, violence, and sexual acts. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others. 

The game contains assault/non-consensual sex, drug abuse, or BDSM.

Contains non-consensual sexual acts by orcs and goblins with humans and elves.
Contains consensual sexual acts between humans.
Contains consensual sexual acts between humans and elves.
Contains male genital expansion due to eating nut.
Contains a scene in which eating nut increases a man's libido and leads him to assault a woman.
Contains sexual acts between humans performed while the human is asleep.
Contains BSDM with a master-slave relationship.
Contains female masturbation.
Contains forced ejaculation by machine.

name: Orc Hunter Wizard Emona

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Emona is a wizard whose magical powers are restored by drinking the semen of her servant. She rescues girls held captive by orcs. Event scenes are fully animated with pixel art. When you attack, a ball called an "Attribute Sphere" appears. Use this to defeat enemies with powerful magic.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Indonesian, Ukrainian, Dutch, Greek, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Czech, Danish, Turkish, Norwegian, Hungarian, Finnish, Bulgarian, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Romanian, Russian
